content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday, july 22, around 10 pm or so (not sure of the exact time) my step son (will refer as son from now on) had gone out to the back of the house to water the trees (he forgot to do it earlier.)note** we are on two acres of land and more than half is a slope plus a flat area at the bottom where there are many mesquite trees and a wash. as he reached down to get the water hose, my son noticed a ball of light (from the distance it seemed about the size of a basketball or slightly bigger)at the bottom of the slope and across the wash. as he describes it, the ball of light was very bright and "pretty" it made him feel "at ease" and the color was something he wasn't quite familiar with....Almost a turquoise color. as he watched the light (he said he froze just looking and recalls a strange silence)within a group of relatively small mesquite trees, it turned off but he noticed that something went straight up rather quickly (it went far enough in the sky that he had to almost look straight up from where he was standing). when it got to a certain altitude it "turned" back on. he's not sure for how long but then it turned back off and saw the object come back down to where it was first seen just above the ground and then light up again (this happened several times but he can't recall how many. (as if it did not want to be seen going up and going down..)he noticed that it would pulsate (at times slowly and other times a little quicker). one thing he did notice (or remember) was that even though the light was very bright, it did not illuminate its surroundings..At all. he finally lost the object while, he believes, it was still at the bottom of the hill.
the next day i asked him to go down there and take a look (i was and still am in california) and he did sometime in the early evening. he took our dog rex with him and as he was nearing the site, he heard footsteps ahead of him. he and rex stopped and looked towards the area of the sighting and noticed 7 or 8 men looking around. he said they were all dressed in black and were wearing gloves because he could not see their hands. they all had short black or dark hair (it was already getting dark). these men seemed to be huddled around the area where the ball of light was the night before. rex also stopped in his tracks and did not want to go further. my son then decided (wisely) to go back to the house and as he reached the top, he noticed the men climbing the opposite hill and then a black suv (he says it was an excursion, from ford) with dark tinted windows, came from the top of the street and all the men got in and left. 
no other incidents since then. please feel free to call us or email me if you have any questions. we can show the area to you also if you have someone in the area. very strange and exciting.
content.summary: Greenish ball of light behind house stationary and moving up and then back down to almost ground level

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation at big bear lake.  i took one family member and my two dogs to hang out at the lake... watch the starts.  currently i have been very interested in ufo's and alien activity.  i wanted to find a ufo.  we saw quite a few things.  almost everything we saw i considered to be some kind of satilite.  some were very bright.  one that would change color... i felt that was simply a satilite being seen through bad air.  
one we found interesting.  at first we thought it was simply a satilite.  it did hold a consatant course and eventuly disapeared behind the mountain... but the interesting part was that it would start as a dim light... start to slowly get brighter.  then suddenly burts of light then back to a dim color.  i knew that i was not just seeing it because my family member and i said "wow" at the same second.  we counted about 30 seconds between bursts.
the event was behind where we were sitting... we had to stand to see it.  my family member did see it first.  but the first burst that was witnessed we did see at the same time.  there was no chance of it being a reflection from the lake as it was far behind the lake... the stars were clear... very little cloud cover (despite the heavy and breif storm in the afternoon that day).
content.summary: Flashing light started dim... then would burst, back to dim then burst again.  high atmosphear.  possible satilite?

content.detailedDescription:
I live in vancouver, washington, a city of several hundred thousand, vancouver is located across the columbia river from portland, oregon. i live on the eastern side of vancouver well within city limits, i have a top-floor apt with a back porch with a somewhat limited viewing area due to neighboring trees, structures ect. i am located ne of and approx. 10 miles from portlands pdx airport and under a north/south air corridor. typical air traffic flies at about 10-30,000 ft elevation.

 on july 21,2009, at 11:47pm i was sitting on my porch stargazing, i had just looked up when i noticed (only because it was moving) a rectanglar shaped object crusing at about 200-300 mi an hour from se to nw at a low altitude, maybe a thousand feet up. its size if drawn on paper and held at arms length was appox. 2"x 4". i could not understand what i was seeing as i am aware that rectangles are not areodynamic, i was stuned and strugling to understand what i was watching. it was a clear starry night, no moon, the iss had passed by at 9:56pm and this was absolutely not that, nor was it any other familar aircraft.

please contact me; i want to know about any other reported rectangular ufo sightings, recent or past.

this sighting is real.
content.summary: Flying rectangle: color: dark/black; no running lights; no other lights; silent; dark line perimeter.

content.detailedDescription: We were camping near salida, co on july 24th 2009. i took 3 photos of this creature by the fire. i didn���t see the creature until later that night! you can see it has an arm sticking out of left side in all 3 photos. not sure what it is? a few minutes later we saw a huge white light in the sky moving towards us! it vanished very slowly. it came from the top of the mountain. we were in a very remote camping spot accessible to 4x4 only. i took photos of the object and it looks like a worm like white light.
content.summary: Strange creature in picture of my wife playing flute while camping!

content.detailedDescription: I went to my back yard to let my dog out. i looked up towards the north-eastern sky and something that was silver that caught my eye. i thought this might've been a jet airliner and looked away. my dog was barking at the same object so i looked again and realized that is a sphere and not a commercial jet aircraft. after seeing this again, i realized that there two more spheres , also in a silver color, which seemed to have orbited around the first sphere i saw. after witnessing this for a few minutes, the objects went up into the sky where i lost sight of them.
content.summary: A silver colored sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was delivering the daily paper this morning and as i put the paper in the last box for the development i was in, i saw a red light in the tree's where there is no red light normally. as i was heading out of the development i was looking to my left and right because there are allot of deer around and i didnt want to hit one. as i looked left i saw through the trees a red/white light that isnt there normally. it was about 100-150 feet in the air and about 300-400 feet away.As i turned onto a crossroad i saw the object again at left/center and it was changing from red to light red/white. i came to the intersection of 169th street and turned right where i lost sight of it. i realized that when i got to hwy 4 where i had another paper to deliver i would be able to see it again so i raced to get to hwy 4. as i turned left onto hwy 4 i saw the object again but it was on my right and allot farther away now so i sped down 4 to deliver the paper as i was watching this thing. i threw the paper in the box and continued down hwy 4 as i watched the object. i stopped and watched as it flew away then i turned around and want back to delivering the rest of my paper

i know it wasnt an airplane or helicopter because the thing didnt have any of the white and green strobelights that planes/choppers have. this thing was glowing light red/white and then red.
content.summary: Saw a object this morning as i delivered papers

content.detailedDescription:
My husband has deer permits because they are eating up his fruit trees.
he has a chair on the roof with a spotlight. i go up on the roof with him sometimes. well, on july 22, i did not go. he came off the roof about 11:00pm, as he can not shoot past 11 at night. he said, he saw a sattelite then it just 'winked' out.
i have been going on the roof every night with him since. except saturday, we had thunderstorms. last night, july 26, i decided to lay down as it crooks my neck to keep looking straight up. the funny thing is, we can only see stars, right over us and some behind us. some times the 'stars' will blink off and on. last night one of the 'stars'. just took off. it went for a ways, then blinked out.
one went a long ways, by they way, they are silent. as soon as it 'went out', it just seem to come back, exactly the same track it has just went. no plane can do that and they do not strobe like planes do and yes, we do see planes too.
one of the nights, a bright light came over the trees with a very small sattelite behind it. it winked out, right away. as the bright light went across the sky, my lines going thru it. meaning it was in 4 sections. then, it to blinked out without going all the way across the sky.
last night, just as i got on the roof and stood up, he told me to look and there was another bright light, just going over the trees, out of sight. completely silent. 
i sure don't know what these things are. i always take a flash light with me, so i can get off the roof safely and down a latter. i thought later, what if i flashed that bright light. i bet it would have shot a beam down at us. so, if i see one again. i probably won't shine my flash light at it. we do talk, as these things are at high. stars are in outer space. but, i suppose these things are not. some times as the cross over they brighten up. it is really weird...
content.summary: Go across the sky and fade out, saw lots of them. like sattelites, but faster

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 10.30pm and i was looking out of my bedroom window and above the sports playing field near my flat i saw four very bright white lights in the shape of a diamond with two lights next to it on the right hand side,the same shape and size as the other lights.I didn't know what this could be but would describe it as if the red arrows were flying in a formation,obviously at this time of night could not be the case.Also there was no sound what so ever.After approx 30 seconds the lights changed into a square shape with the two 'odd' ones staying in the same position.They stayed like this for 3 or 4 mins and then just vanished.There was light cloud cover that night but they definatly did not go behind a cloud they just suddenly vanished.I watched the sky for about ten minutes but saw nothing after that.I was left feeling totally baffled by the sudden dissapearance of the lights and the fact that there was no sound accompanying them.We often have a police spotter plane pass over and i knew it wasn't an ordinary aeroplane.
content.summary: 4 bright white lights in a diamond shape changing to a square shape

content.detailedDescription:
I have been targeted since the age of 5 is the earliest i can remember. i have encountered the missing time, paralyse (sp) even pulled a piece of metal out of my nose at the age of sixteen! why are these crafts i have seen never the same as any of the thousands of pic i have looked at?? 
i beleive in my heart and soul there is a tracking device in me! 

i will submit to any testing, hypnosis , anything! the more this goes on the more its bothering me ! after seeing the pic of this last one it just brought back all the other memmories i have tried to forget. 

these are not little focking gray men! at least, thats not the descripton they want me to believe! 

also, this second siteing was "one block" from the last one !!! 

heres another one for you focksticks! i had a scuba diving accident at the age of 16 to which, i had to have my sinuses checked for rupturing!! the focking doctor told me i had nasal surguery!!!!!!!!!!! 


these are not lizard people and all this other bull !! at least not the species that come after me or want me to see them as something else.

fyi focksticks- i never had a halucination in my life.......
content.summary: Follow-up from previous report

content.detailedDescription:
Caught the ufo in my pictures while at a fireworks display! didnt know it till i went to edit/ delete the photos that didnt turn out!!!!

i reported it to mr davenport and no one seems the slightest bit interested!!
i spoke with him years ago and told him they would be back. ths is the second one the first was prob late 70's and within 75 feet.
everyone thinks i am nuts and i had 2 witnesses the first time!!!

sorry no photo attached sent it to too many already..  mark
content.summary: Caught the ufo in my pictures while at a fireworks display

content.detailedDescription: I just want to let you know that it wasn't a ufo.  you described and pictured the international space station with shuttle attached and 13 member crew on board. really great view of them last night. they passed over ohio at 9:27 pm and went west to east and was visible for 4 minutes.  look it up. it's just amazing how many people still must not know about the iss because of so many reports here that describe it.  please people, look up the iss viewing opportunities first before posting.
content.summary: To the person reporting bright light from ohio and other who don't know about iss

content.detailedDescription:
The nights of july 16th and 17th were lovely warm and clear summer evenings for watching the stars and looking for satellites. prior to the time of ufo sighting i had sighted about six satellites and multiple high altitude aircraft. i had been laying on the ground for about one half hour in a way that no ground based lights were visible. my body was positioned in a north to south direction.  (location coordinates  41���37'45.18"n  120���12'50.27"w). around 2330 i noticed a bright white light traveling west to east from a point starting on a line about one half of the distance between my north horizon and the north star. the light felt like it was shining from a beginning distance of 15 to 20 miles to the north of my position which would be in the neighbor hood of mount bidwell (coordinates: 41���57'57"n  120���9'56"w). the light reminded me of a brightness of an aircraft landing light except that it felt like it was too far away and was traveling at an angle away from my point of view.  no navigation lights were visible at any time around the light.  the light did not appear to be directional like a landing light. the path of the diminishing size indicated possible travel away in an east north easterly direction, with the light fading and extinguishing from view prior to my north east horizon.  transit time was in the range of one minute.

this path would be consistent with possible travel for a military night training flight from kingsley field in klamath falls, or (lmt), to the hart south moa. however, the transit time across the horizon and perceived distance appeared much too fast for a jet not in afterburner and under the speed of sound. the night was still and no sound was apparent. my position was slightly east of airway v 165 and high altitude aircraft are regularly visible transiting north to south both west and far to the east of my position.  i have never seen a light maneuver like this one, nor have i ever noticed any other flying object that i did not feel could be reasonably explained. 

this location is in a sparsely populated region of california.  documented cattle mutilations have occurred in the past on local ranches. i am a former navy and commercial pilot flying such aircraft such the c-130 in the atlantic and pacific regions so am familiar with aircraft and landing lights.
content.summary: Bright white light at high speed ne corner of calif

content.detailedDescription:
When this sighting occurred i was a firefighter in imperial county in southern california. i am currently a school teacher in san diego county.
i have never reported this until now, though it occurred prior to the usa's bicentennial.
there were 4 of us driving from hwy 86 near the salton sea, going to the mountain community, julian, ca up hwy 78. it was a clear spring afternoon with no detectable air movement. we had passed rt.3 and then rt.2 and were climbing the narrow winding rd. approaching the julian area when one of the rear passengers got excited and had me pull to the side just as i approached an observation pullout. he pointed across to the other side of the sloped arroyo, covered with thick green 4-5 ft. high chapparal brush about 100 ft above the base of the mountain. it had no road nor pathway on that side and was less than 200 feet across from us.
what we saw was a small chrome-like sphere, perfectly round with no observable markings approaching us . at first, due to the distance and speed, i thought it was a motorcyle rider's helmet reflecting the sun, but as it got closer there was nothing beneath it and was too big, perhaps 2 feet in diameter. it moved at a perfect steady speed and height just inches above the brush. it was too steady and fast to be a balloon and there wasn't even a slight breeze. nothing was attached to it.
we watched it pass and go in the direction we came, but on the other side of the pass. we watched it rise and fall with the terrain in a perfect horizontal path until it rounded the mountain about a mile behide us and dissappeared as it rounded the bend. it never waivered, other than to clear and follow the mountainside, in a straight path to some unknown destination.
when it was over we all confirmed that what we saw and did was the same thing. we all described it exactly the same except for it's perceived size, which varied from 1 1/2 ft to 3 ft across. none of us could explain how it could have possibly manuvered the way it did. none of us had ever seen anything like it before. we all agreed that it was a ufo, but not anything like what we expected one to look like.
since then i have heard of similar sightings and decided to add my confirmation that these things do (or did) exist. four of us witnessed one.
content.summary: Chrome sphere approx. 2 ft . diameter cruising 20-25 mph, inches above chaparral brush, horizontal to bottom slope of mountain, air was still, 4 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
Observed an object traveling slowly from south to north, flashing a linear row of white bright strobe lights sequentially along its entire length from back to front, a bright red strobe on the front, and a bright large blue white strobe light on it's rear end on one corner, and a large white strobe light on the other corner. object was 15 degrees up from the horizon to the west of my position, 15 to 20 miles away, and an estimated 1/2 to 1 mile in length. 
it stopped and hovered in one position, while slowly rotating end to end, for approx. 15 min. it then proceeded to slowly travel in a north westerly direction for 5 min or so until it disappeared behind the trees in the distance. the object was at an estimated altitude of 4000 to 6000 feet. it could be that the lights were rotating and not the object, but when i observed the lights strobe along it's length when i first spotted it, i had the distinct impression that it had a linear shape to it rather than a round shape to it. the lights that strobed along it's length were a very bright white, much brighter and larger than an airplanes lights, and no aircraft have white strobe lights flashing along the length of the craft. it took a good 4 or so min. for the object to travel from south to north before it stopped and hovered, leaving ample time to sort of discern its general shape. 
i did not observe an outline or actual craft, only the lights strobing. all of the lights strobed without exception, no flashing lights at all were observed.
observations were calm and deliberate. i stared at it till my eyes watered, then it disappeared behind the trees.
content.summary: Object moving slowly south to north, strobing red, blue, white lights, stops, hovers for 15 min. slowly rotating lengthwise.

content.detailedDescription:
Although i see many reports posted, my siting was at close range. i was at a party at a bay front house over looking jones beach and at around 4pm i was talking to a gentleman who is a commercial airline pilot.We were talking about cars. all of a sudden his wife says , hey bob check out that thing in the sky. we both looked. it was a brite red orange light off in the distance heading south.She chuckled and said it looks like a ufo. from where we were sitting we could see a commuter airliner on approach to kennedy airport.The light and the 4 engine jet seemed to be the same distance away.They also seemed to be at the same elevation.The light was as big as the jet from my vantage point.I thought it was strange and when i asked bob what he thought, he said he thinks he sees a flashing strobe.I thought humm, and we went back to talking cars.
       at around 10:30 pm i was still at the party and all of a sudden i hear the children on the dock say, what the heck is that ? i looked up and there it was, a huge red orange egg shaped craft comming over the house.It headed due south out to the ocean.There was a cloud out in the distance and it seemed to dissappear into the cloud.A few seconds into this, another one comes from the western side of the house.It went in the same direction.A few seconds later a 3rd one comes over the house and heads out over the ocean just like the other 2. while the 3rd one was heading out i notice to the east that a commuter jet was traveling north west comming from over the ocean and i said to my girlfriend that gauging the jet i thought the ufos were as big if not bigger then the jet. they were moving about as fast as the jets look on approach.I was told that the jets come in at about 4000 feet.There was no way those pilots didnt see these craft. at that elevation these craft were huge.I also should mention that they made no sound.I am sorry that we did not take a picture or have a video camera because i believe this would have been the greatest ufo video ever shot.Some of my friends saw this from 15 miles west of where i was.Another friend was about 7 miles west of me and saw them with her kids.This was an awsome sight. all i can think is that everything i read about ufos came true at that moment.Its a little scary. i even spoke to stanton friedman after taking his phone # out of his book flying saucers and science. he was generous with his time and seemed interested in the story. thanks.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sitings

content.detailedDescription:
It was very windy this night with a strong wind blowing from the se. i went outside to walk my dog when i noticed something in the sky out of the corner of my eye. i saw what appeared to be something about as bright as a street light. but here in tilden, tx we do not have many street lights and this light was pretty high off the ground so i knew this was not what it was. i am guessing it was about a 1000 ft off the ground. i thought it might be the front landing lights of an aircraft but there is not airfield close by here and this was bright orange. we do get military aircraft here due to the bombing range but this was no airplane. this was moving very, very slow from west to east. i was yelling for my wife to get out here to see it but by the time she got there it was fading away. i am not sure if it was gaining altitude or just fading away but it was gone with no sign of it anywhere. i looked for it to reappear off in the horizon, but there was nothing. i am not sure what i saw but i have seen a thousand aircraft in the night sky and this was no aircraft or sattelite. if there was anything else reported like this around this date please let me know. 

gabe spencer
content.summary: Very bright orange light or ball

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my front porch with my wife. a light came over the house way up in the sky. at first i thought it was a jet, but then i realized there was no sound, it was too bright and there were no red/green lights. if it had been a jet, i would have heard some sound due to the speed it was moving would have had some type of jet noise. 

the thing that really made me notice was that it was so bright, brighter and whiter than any other aircraft i had ever seen in the area. i listened for any sound of engines and looked for the typical navigation lights usually seen on aircraft. however this had no sound and no nav lights. i watched as this made a straight path towards the east. i took a picture with my crappy iphone and it showed up on the image. 


i watched until the light turned off (?) and disappeared. if this were an aircraft, there should have been nav lights , but there was nothing.
content.summary: Bright light traveling in straight line from  west to east.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our back porch. i noticed it was bright and moving. bright object appeared from the west and arced across the sky to the south east. it was in airplane altitude. clear and bright white light. had no green or red blinking like an airplane and it was completely quiet. seemed to move at a steady speed. went over the horizon and couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Bright orb

content.detailedDescription:
Extremely bright object at high altitude, traveling at a moderate speed, from nw to se from greene  county into lenoir county, disapeared when attempted to digital video record. object did not appear to be a shooting star nor an aircraft. no aircraft identification lights were observed. an aircraft was traveling perpendicular to the travel path of the object but was obviously smaller, and at a lower altitude with aircraft identification lights. 
1. i had just walked out onto the back porch which faces almost due south.
2. when i gout at night, i always look up at the sky to observe the stars.
3. unidentified, possibly the space station or the shuttle. ihave no idea 
   if it has landed yet.
4. described in opening paragraph.
5. attempted to call daughter to let her know, no answer; then called x 
   wife to share this with her.
5. described in opening paragraph.
content.summary: Extremely bright object at high altitude traveling nw to se from greene  county into lenoir county, disapeared when attempted to digital video record.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dusk, sometime in the late fall of 1995 or winter of 1996, i think, and i was driving home from my job across the mississippi river in davenport, iowa to my home in moline, illinois. as i drove south on i-74 toward the john deere exits, i saw a ufo hovering just above a clump of trees near a field by the side of the road. i watched it for a minute or so and, at first, thought it was some kind of big advertising balloon. it looked like a "flying saucer" but i couldn't believe that it was. i tried to keep it in sight as i took the cloverleaf exit to john deere road east. by that time, i had decided that it wasn't a balloon and had to be a ufo, the first i had ever seen.

i drove east on john deere road, trying to keep it in sight as i approached it. at that time, the south side of jd road, was mostly fields, with one large section, near the interstate, which was being graded for construction of a strip mall with a wal-mart. as i got closer to my street (60th street, moline) i saw that the object was lower, now hovering just above a huge sign in front of a gas station/minimart. the sign said 
m a r t and was approximately 12'- 15' wide and about 3' high. it was at the top of posts, about 15' tall, so the ufo was about 20' above the ground. it was about the same length of the sign, 12-15' wide and seemed to be made of 2 plates (the top one upside down), with large round windows in between. the windows were glowing. 

as i drove along, with some other traffic in both directions, i kept repeating to myself "why aren't we stopping? why isn't everyone pulling over to look at this thing?" but, like everyone else, i just kept driving and staring. as i drove past it, i bent down and tried to see the back of it through the passenger-side windows. it looked the same all the way around, at least as much of it as i could see. 

suddenly, i was facing straight ahead and repeating (in my head) "it's time to go home now. it's time to go home now. it's time to go home now." i didn't try to look back and see if the object was still there; i was completely focused on going home and kept repeating "it's time to go home now" as i drove home to my apartment building.

every time that night, when i started to think about what i had seen, my mind would switch away to something else. i was very uncomfortable whenever i tried to remember what had happened. then, about a year later, in the summer, when there were a number of television shows about ufos, commemorating the 50th anniversary of the crash at roswell, i saw one very short clip of exactly the same object that i had seen. in the clip, it looked exactly the same, including the same size, and was slowly moving above some trees and across the screen. i was very excited because, in all of the tv ufo programs i had seen, this was the first -- and only -- time i had seen anything that looked like "my" ufo. that was also the first time in months that i had allowed myself to remember the sighting. prior to that, something had always kept me from thinking about it.
content.summary: Driving home from work, i saw a small ufo hovering above a very large sign, beside john deere road, east.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were driveing down northwest express lane,its short of a short cut on time.Anyway looking to my left over on the moutain is this huge rectagular looking thing so i ask my wife what she thought and she said it looked lke a huge r.V.And i said yeah but its bigger than the tree's around it way bigger.Where it was sitting thay cleared for logging so we could see the size and shape clealy.We got to town about 12:30 and left around 2:30,3:00 p.M.On the way back it was gone.The one thing that cought my eye was how bright the u.F.O. was like a birght pice of silver hard to miss.Some thing you put things into,like it held or would hold something.If you ever seen resendent evil exetion that box they had those zombies in thats what it looked like.No action's just sat there.My feelings were like why is there a box big enough to hold king kong doing sitting on the side of the moutain.Lost sight driveing into town.
content.summary: It was a big silver box parked on side of an old logging road on a mountain clearing.

content.detailedDescription: In the 1970's white sands missile range was launching all kinds of missiles that were anti-aircraft missiles & work on anti-missile missiles with nuclear tipped warheads did exist... me & my father charles a 20 year u.S. air force airman were getting into his vw car on a thursday night at about 9:30 pm this intense fireball instantly flashed directly over head & looking all around me, up & down the street it was as bright as the sun at high noon for about 20 seconds!!!! the las cruces newpaper stated at that time "instense fireball lights up all of las cruces as bright as the high noon sun"!!!! but nothing about what it really was or if in fact a anti-ballistic nuclear warhead missile was launched & the nuclear warhead was exploded in outer space??? a outer space nuclear blast would have a instense fire-ball flash but would go away pretty fast without any sound or noise of the blast... i would very very much like to find out exactly what that instense fireball was on that dark winter night back in the 1970's right here in las cruces, new mexico????
content.summary: Intense bright fireball as bright as mid-day sun ! ! ! !

content.detailedDescription: While driving in our rental car back to our hotel from a trip to yellowstone park, i took pictures while driving or we stopped to take pictures. i did not notice any object when i took the picture. but when i came home and downloaded the picture on my computer i was surprised to see this object. i would like to know what it could be.
content.summary: It appears to have the shape of a blimp.

content.detailedDescription: We were on our honeymoon in sedona staying at the wyndham.  on the night of july 19, 2009, at 11:10 pm we went on our balcony, which overlooks the mountains, and saw a brilliant light in the sky, above the mountain.  at first i thought it could be an airplane or helicopter but then realized it was too high for a helicopter.  and that an airplane would not stay still for so long - there were also no red blinking lights that an airplane has when flying at night. there were few stars in the sky, due to some storm clouds and light pollution  - it was the only light.  after 10 min with it still in one spot we grabbed our camera and took still pictures and video.  attached are photos, and video which we took that night.  when we viewed the video enlarged, it appeared to be a gyro sphere shape made of mostly energy.   you will see a rotating ball of light in the center of the screen.  we left the camera on a tripod so it stayed stationary.  as you will see it just hovers in the sky.  then the ufo fades out, due to cloud coverage.  we were excited that we saw this ufo on our honeymoon.  three days later we went to a store in sedona called "ye olde ufo store", they sell ufo items such as t-shirts, bumper stickers etc.  we wanted to get a t-shirt for ourselves because of the event.  we spoke with the store manager jen, who told us her boss bill saw the same object in the sky on the very same night we did.  he drew a picture of what he saw, and it was exactly what we had on film - exciting!!
content.summary: Ufo was in the sky for over 20 min in one spot.  we took pictures and videos.   it appeared to be a gyrosphere shape made of mostly energy

content.detailedDescription: At the same address of the other siteing at 952 calle sereno in las cruces from the southeast direction going northwest, i first saw a large flaming fireball that looked like someone shooting off somekind of very large firework, that was my first impression; i quickly realized that the flaming fireball was much larger & much higher up as the flames quickly vanished, it was a very bright cherry hot large bullet shaped object!!! it went to different shades of bright red to dull orange to a total fade out... i do think this object was also man-made for it looked exactly like the main tank on the space shuttle, however no space shuttle launch was made at that time & i honestly do not know if the main tank is released in outer space??? i also called the new mexico state police in the time frame of one minute after the siting & they informed me to contact the white sands military police... the very next day i did call the military police at white sands, they stated that a small missile was launched at about the same time or at 1:30 a.M. however it was directly east of my location & it was not any kind of near obital missile launch!!! my main ??? is i do not know if the main shuttle tank stays in orbit for any length of time & if any other nations have anything that large??? this siteing was around 2 years before the large delta  triangle craft was seen but at the very same location & address... can you please contact me with any possible  explanation for these siteing's??? the las cruces sun news is a very very hippy pot-loving college student liberal news paper that is almost totalee worthless when it comes to any kind news reporting!!!! p.S. little kid's & children could run the las cruces sun news much much much much better than they do... also way back in the 1970's my father and i had a siteing that was so  bright of a fire ball that at about 9:30 at night & for about 15 to 20 seconds this fireball lite the whole area at 1430 grover drive also in las cruces as bright as the mid-day sun!!!! but without any explosion sound. white sands missile range did have anti-missile missiles with nuclear tipped warheads but no info or data of such a outer space detonation was ever made known to the public!!!
content.summary: Cherry hot red very large bullet shaped object

content.detailedDescription: My brother, a friend, and i were on our deck in lakeway texas. we were having a casual conversation when the ufo appeared. i was staring off into the horizon, facing nw, just staring at the lake and stars. all of a sudden, (and i mean out of nowhere) there suddenly appeared a very bright red light. i shouted, "what is that?" my brother and friend turned and saw the bright red light, we briefly inquired amongst ourselves whether or not it was a flare. james, my brother, grabbed a pair of (8x42)bushnell excursions binoculars, (we keep a pair on the deck to bird watch etc.)he quickly got them focused. my friend and i sat amazed, commenting that there was no sound at all, we also agreed it increased in brightness. james was quickly able to determine that the bright red light (spherical or circular, as viewed from the deck) when focused in the binoculars was definitely an object with lights, he explained a red one and a smaller purple-ish/white. all the while we are quickly analyzing possible explanations in our heads. he hands the binoculars to me and i get the object focused and clearly there was a definitive object, with lights helping to define its features. the lights appeared as a bright red and in my opinion a smaller white/yellow one, possibly two, i yelled to him to grab the camera and in that instant it blinked out, it "turned-off." it was there and then gone. before we got overly excited the natural skeptic voice in our heads was calling out. we all three agreed that there was no way that it was a helicopter of any kind. this is based on the fact that we have lived in this location all of our lives and have seen "star - flight" and other helicopters at all hours at any angle etc. and there is always a sound, this made no sound. the flare idea was shot down as well, after we focused the object it clearly was not a flare, the only reason a flare was thought of was to perhaps explain its sudden appearance. it also did not pulsate or blink out like a flare, nor did it drop in elevation as a flare would. after what appeared to be stillness and no motion of the object and/or it's flight path, it's course seemed to be heading, albeit very slowly, in our general direction (roughly se as it was coming in from the nw), and once again it was lower on the horizon and in the sky than anything conventional. i am very familiar with planes appearing on the horizon and coming closer and closer and closer until it passes over. this was not the case it was to low on the horizon to be a plane, at least compared to any plane we have seen from this deck, also there was no sound. it was not some private plane; it (the light) appeared, continued to increase in brightness, then seemed to fly towards our direction, very slowly and with no sound (so it appeared), and then blinked out, to be clear -- it did not fade out, or slowly dim, it specifically "turned off." i consider myself to be somewhat (as well as my brother)an ametuar skywatcher; we have a celeston nexstar 130 slt and love gazing at the stars. our feelings were of amazement, nervousness, shock, realization, etc. we realized we saw an unidentified object in the sky, one that appeared to be cruising at a very low altitude and speed, with no sound. all of us are familiar with ufology especially what has recently been going on in texas. i am no expert, but if i were to classify this particular type of object, i (and my brother) agree it was somewhat triangular in shape and appeared to be bigger than a helicopter or small plane, but was not bigger than a commercial aircraft. basically the view through the binoculars was filled up with the object, the object and its lights seemed to fit fully within the viewing context (lens of the 8x42 bushnell excursion). as to its location, it was higher than the horizon on the other side of the lake by a few inches, that is to say if you are looking out at the horizon the object was roughly 1-3 inches higher than the green hills on the other side of the lake. we could also clearly tell it was not past the horizon, it appeared to be between us and the other side of the lake, our general consensus was that it was over the lake at the time of our viewing window.
content.summary: Bright red light appeared out of nowhere, increased in brightness, it was over the lake (lake travis), shortly after focusing binoculars it disappeared completely

content.detailedDescription:
Approx. 00:45 edt on 7/25/2009, from my back yard, i saw an unusual orange light travelling south to north @ approx. 20 degrees elevation
seemed flare a bit. 
it looked to be below the cloud cover and maintained a level flight for the 30 seconds i watched it. traveled from sse to ene from my perspective. 
visible from western wayne county in michigan (approx 25 miles west of detroit). 
i called the local police and was told there were no reports at the time and "we'll check it out". i'm looking for any similar observations.
content.summary: Bright orange light

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving south on alabama street between the 25th and 27th streets and saw an orange light in the sky traveling slow. i noticed it floating beyond some trees and watched it as it traveled at a steady but slow pace. i was with my friend, who was driving, and my boyfriend, who was sitting in the back of a truck. we were going to the movies and were going to the late show. i pointed it out to my companions and said, "what is that?" and they noticed it too. we pulled up to the stop sign and watched it. it was still there as we went another 2 blocks south and then pulled over and watched it. we stopped at the corner of 27th terrace and alabama street. once we got out of the truck it seemed to move faster away from us, we were trying to discuss what it could be. it was too slow and had a constant orange glow to be a plane or a helocopter and did not exhibit any flashing or pulsating lights. it was very slow and seemed to be flying in a curve upwards and right. as we watched it, it dimmed so that it almost disappeared and then came back for a few moments and then faded again and was completely gone. the whole thing lasted for about 5 minutes.
there were no clouds in the sky and you clearly see stars. we then drove to louisiana street cutting across westward on 27th terrace and continued south on louisiana. we were still hoping to see it in the sky somewhere because we couldn't believe that it had disappeared. we drove all the way to n 1250 rd, where there are less lights and traffic, and continued to look for it in the sky but there was no movement anywhere. if it was a plane or helocopter, we should have still been able to see it from where we were.
content.summary: Spotted heading south

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were laying in the grass in allen gardens park - one of the many parks in the heart of downtown toronto.  it was a clear day with no clouds in the sky and i was laying on my back reading a book. 

a sudden feeling of peace came over me and i put my book down so i could bask in the feeling more fully. i was looking into the sky when i saw what i thought was a seagull (there were many gulls flying about that day). i thought it strange that a bird fly so high it would appear as a sphere. i then noticed it was not alone. there was an identical sphere traveling next to it. 

the two objects smoothly glided across the clear sky far above the city. they kept the exact same distance from one another (you could probably fit five of the same sized spheres between the two), almost as if there were an invisible rod separating them. as they glided in what seemed a perfect line, i could see that they were perfect orbs with reflective surfaces. 

it was strange because i wasn't excited in the least, in fact i was very calm.  i had seen objects in the sky as a child but i never trusted the memories because i was so young and i had not experienced anything like it in my adulthood. i mention this only because i found my mood and reaction to be surprisingly uncommon.  

i got my boyfriend's attention and pointed the objects out to him. he too was strangely calm throughout the sighting. we watched in contentment as they smoothly crossed the open sky, following them with pointed fingers so that anyone else interested in the park could see them too. 

just before they were out of sight behind a high rise building, a third shining sphere rapidly flew across the sky with unimaginable speed and stopped abruptly without slowing when it met the other two spheres.  keeping the same distance from its partners as the two original spheres had, the now three spheres (all the same size, same reflective anteriors and same distance from one another) glided together out of sight, forming a seemingly perfect triangular formation. 

i now look for similar things in the sky whenever there is a clear day (there haven't been many, we've had an uncommonly rainy summer this year) but i haven't seen anything in the daytime like this.  only once more on july 9th, approximately 12:30am. my boyfriend and i were out on a late night walk because we could actually see some stars in the night sky (a very rare occurrence in downtown toronto).

we went to a park that had low light pollution and we were able to see many stars. that is when we saw what looked like stars (they shined the same) moving across the night sky. they all glided quickly and smoothly in perfect lines across the night sky until they were out of sight. 

they did not leave behind tails of light like comets do and they moved way too quickly to be airplanes or satellites.  my assumption is that the objects were out of our atmosphere and they were reflecting sunlight causing them to glow in the night sky as they flew by. 

we saw four at different times within a twenty minute time frame. the third we saw didn't just fly out of sight. it moved smoothly across the sky then flashed, as if there was a big explosion then it was just gone.
neither my boyfriend or i had the same calm feelings we had when we saw the three orbs in the daytime.  we were just excited and skeptical, not really placing too much in the possibility these objects were like the spheres.
content.summary: Two  spheres gliding across the sky, then joined by a third, creating a trianglular form/ four lights in the sky, one flashes before it dissapears

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the front row of the sandstome amphitheatre and my 5 year old son first saw a light and asked if it was a satellite, (a bright light moving slowly high in the sky).  since there were few stars viable, i looked as we sat there and saw the light, and confirmed to him indeed it was a satellite as it was a bright light moving slowly over the concert area from south to north.  the light then zigzagged in a "z" fashion and moved fasted to the east and the light dimmed and finally extinguished prior to the horizon.  we had watched planes before sundown and this was not in the flight pattern of other planes we had been watching previously, and don't believe that a helicopter to have made such rapid moves, nor would have had such a bright light.  people behind me (none of us under the influence of drugs or alcohol) all thought it an unusual occurrence.
content.summary: Bright light, thought it was a satillite.  passing slowly then zigzagged and went in another direction, and faded.
